ygData.subject: Re: Clerics in Bristlebane
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I may be wrong here, but I believe that higher order armour is of little use to a lower level character.  You will not gain the extra AC benefit at lower
ygData.messageBody:
> Does anyone recommend using my coin to buy the higher order
> armor for now or wait until higher levels where I can generate a
> little more coin and just save my coin now for spells at level 9?
> Any suggestions are certainly welcome.

I may be wrong here, but I believe that higher order armour is of little
use to a lower level character. You will not gain the extra AC
benefit at lower levels as your character is deemed to not be
experienced enough to make the best use of it.
Go for the spells. They are what make you a cleric my friend.

Itan the Whistler
